item.title: The 1 Thing Tylenol Should Do First to Fix Its Brand Image
item.description: The stronger the brand, the greater its reputational resiliency. So why is Tylenol having such a hard time?

item.title: Sleep Tracking Is Just Making You More Anxious. Here’s What Science Says You Should Do Instead
item.description: Apple new Sleep Score is the latest in a growing trend that isn’t necessarily making us more rested.

item.title: The White House Keeps Crowning Stock Market Winners
item.description: The U.S. took a 10 percent stake in Trilogy Metals and the stock soared over 200 percent.

item.title: Anthropic and IBM Are Teaming Up to Build an AI-Powered Coding Tool
item.description: Microsoft and Deloitte also recently partnered with Anthropic on similar AI tools for enterprises.

item.title: How to Unlock Innovation With the Kaizen and Kaikaku Methods
item.description: Growth companies that master both continuous improvement and breakthrough innovation outpace those that only optimize.
